name: PERSON_PREFERENCES
description: This table contains items related to Person Preferences. Unlike COMM_PREF_ADDL_ITEMS which stores communication preferences, this table stores data that is relevant to a person's preferences.

columns.name: PERSON_PREFERENCE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the subject name record.

columns.name: TZ_DIFF_ALERT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a user chooses to see an alert popup for time zone difference between the notification time zone and local time zone. "Y" indicates that the user chooses to see the popup. "N" or NULL indicates that the user does not want to see the popup.
